subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Matt Moulson scored three times for his second straight multigoal game, Al Montoya stopped 20 shots and the Islanders cruised to a 5-1 victory over the visiting Florida Panthers on Monday.
snippet: Matt Moulson scored three times for his second straight multigoal game, Al Montoya stopped 20 shots and the Islanders cruised to a 5-1 victory over the visiting Florida Panthers on Monday.
